vote.title: To amend the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget; to authorize the City Auditor to appropriate and transfer funds from the Special Income Tax to the Affordable Housing Taxable Bond Fund; to authorize the Director of the Department of Development to enter into a grant agreement in an amount up to $500,000.00 with the Ohio Community Development Finance Fund for the Preston Pointe project; to authorize the expenditure of $500,000.00 from the Affordable Housing Taxable Bond Fund; and to declare an emergency. ($500,000.00)
vote.description: This item was approved on the Consent Agenda.
